attributes.action: force the BBC to stop selling Licence fee funded programmes to channels only on Sky etc, and show them all again on free to air TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC has produced some of the best programmes never to be seen again.  

As the licence fee pays towards these programmes, the BBC has a duty to show them again for all to see.  Why should we have to pay hundreds of pounds a year just to watch them again.

Where would the BBC be without the licence fee?
